2.0.0.en:
Updated discord.js to v14
üí• Breaking: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: `PLAYING` is now `Playing`, `GUILD_TEXT` is now `GuildText`.
üí• Breaking: In raw states all `type` field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types.
Add support for messages from the notification-manager adapter
Updated dependencies
Added Ukrainian translations
Updated translations

text.en: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: PLAYING is now Playing, GUILD_TEXT is now GuildText. In raw states all type field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types. Please make sure to check and update your usages of the types after upgrading to version 2.0.0 or newer.

In Rohzust√§nden sind nun alle type-Werte Zahlen, die den internen Enum-Werten der Typen entsprechen. Bitte darauf achten, die Verwenung von Typ-Werten nach dem Upgrade auf Version 2.0.0 oder neuer zu √ºberpr√ºfen und ggf. zu aktualisieren.

Em estados crus, todos os valores de campo do tipo s√£o agora n√∫meros que representam os valores enum internos dos tipos. Certifique-se de verificar e atualizar seus usos dos tipos ap√≥s atualizar para a vers√£o 2.0.0 ou mais recente.

In rauwe staten zijn alle veldwaarden nu cijfers die de interne waarden van de types vertegenwoordigen. Controleer alsjeblieft en update je gebruik van de types na het upgraden naar versie 2.0 of nieuwer.

Dans les √©tats bruts, toutes les valeurs de champ de type sont maintenant des nombres repr√©sentant les valeurs internes des types. Assurez-vous de v√©rifier et de mettre √† jour vos utilisations des types apr√®s la mise √† niveau de la version 2.0.0 ou plus r√©cente.

In stati grezzi tutti i valori di campo di tipo sono ora numeri che rappresentano i valori enum interni dei tipi.
